TEXT.TITLE: PUERTO RICAN COMPANY GETS JET FUEL CONTRACT
TEXT.BODY: The Puerto Rico Sun Oil Co is being awarded a 42.4 mln dlr contract for jet fuel, the Defense Department said. It said work on the contract, which was awarded as part of a multi-contract procurement program, is expected to be completed by April 1988. Reuter
